headline: 3 things every car buyer should know about the latest Fed decision
summary: Throughout most of the year, tariffs and the threat of them have forced car companies to increase their incentive spending to get buyers through the door. Buyers have responded to that signal, leading to a record-setting pace for car companies like Ford, General Motors, and Kia. ...
